nodes.text: The Skink was a model of truncated speeder bike produced by Meirm Speeder Emporium during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.
The Meirm Skink was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic on May 4, 2015 as part of the Core Worlds and Deep Core Explorer's Packs.
